amendment.description: To ensure continued operational capability for long-range bomber missions in the event of termination of the B-21 bomber program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4079 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4079 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Heitkamp.
